name: Escape the Island (itch) (John Wuller)
description:
After barely surviving a fatal accident, you, the sole surviving scientist, remains as a witness to the aftermath of a disastrous experiment gone wrong.

Forced to wander the island looking for scraps, you must repair your chopper as fast as possible to escape to civilization!

Beware, however: the disaster has left the island cracked! Just like Atlantis, the island slowly sinks into the poisoned ocean water every 10 seconds.

You must navigate the island, bridge the gaps by collecting scrap metal, and find parts to rebuild your chopper!

Note: due to a bug, in order to change difficulties, you must exit and reenter the game or reload the page
